trans-unit.source: Contains information, such as the row and column indexes, about a specific coordinate pair in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
This class cannot be inherited.
The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTest%2A> method of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> class returns a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo>.
You can use this method to determine which part of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView> control is located at the specified coordinates.
For example, you can call this method specifying the coordinates of a mouse click to determine the row and column indexes of the clicked cell or whether a header cell or scroll bar was clicked.
Gets the index of the column that contains the coordinates described by the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo"></xref>.

The index of the column in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that contains the coordinates described by the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo"></xref>.
Gets the x-coordinate of the beginning of the column that contains the coordinates described by the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo"></xref>.

The x-coordinate of the column in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that contains the coordinates described by the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo"></xref>.
Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Object"></xref> is equal to the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo"></xref>.
The <xref href="System.Object"></xref> to compare with the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo"></xref>.
`true` if value is a in which the values of the , , and properties are the same as the current .
Serves as a hash function for a particular type.
A hash code for the current <xref href="System.Object"></xref>.
Specifies that the point is not on a cell or cell header.
This field is read-only.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTest%2A> method returns <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo.Nowhere> when the specified point is at an empty area of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView>.
Gets the index of the row that contains the coordinates described by the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo"></xref>.

The index of the row in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that contains the coordinates described by the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo"></xref>.
Gets the y-coordinate of the top of the row that contains the coordinates described by the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo"></xref>.

The y-coordinate of the row in the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> that contains the coordinates described by the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo"></xref>.
Returns a string that represents a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo"></xref>.

The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo.ToString%2A> method returns a string that includes the value of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo.Type%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo.ColumnIndex%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo.RowIndex%2A> properties.
A string that represents a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo"></xref>.

Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHitTestType"></xref> that indicates which part of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> the coordinates described by the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo"></xref> belong to.

A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewHitTestType"></xref> value that indicates the control part at the coordinates described by the current <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.HitTestInfo"></xref>.
